price: Mose kaa sε: “Ɛmma saa da! Nokorε sε, Me Wura Nyankopͻn ka me ho, Ɔbεkyerε me kwan “
arabic: قَالَ كَلَّآۖ إِنَّ مَعِيَ رَبِّي سَيَهۡدِينِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla kallā inna maʿiya rabbī sayahdīni
